QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct census_division, CASE census_division WHEN '1' THEN '(CT, ME, MA, NH, RI, VT)' WHEN '2' THEN '(NJ, NY, PA)' WHEN '3' THEN '(IA, KS, MN, MO, ND, SD)' WHEN '4' THEN '(IL, IN, MI, OH, WI)' WHEN '5' THEN '(AL, KY, MS, TN)' WHEN '6' THEN '(DE, DC, FL, GA, MD, NC, SC, VA, WV)' WHEN '7' THEN '(AR, LA, OK, TX)' WHEN '8' THEN '(AZ, CO, ID, MT, NV, NM, UT, WY)' WHEN '9' THEN '(AK, CA, HI, OR, WA)' END as location_source_value from {sc}.hf_d_hospital where census_division is not null and census_division != '' order by census_division
